txt.en: '[placeholder], my companions each carried a sigil to signify our allegiance to our clan. When my companions fell to the attack, many of these sigils were taken.\n\n'Will you attempt to recover the sigils from the dunlendings atop the hill? If so, journey south and up the hill. The scouts will be the ones carrying the sigils.'
'You have done me a great service, Duvodiad. The cowards will not sully the memory of those who stood beside me in honour.'
'Have you collected my companions' sigils yet?'
When Bledhun's band was attacked, sigils were stripped from the corpses of the fallen and distributed to the Dievligs as a reward.

The hill where Bledhun's party was once encamped lies to the south of Bledhun's current camp.\n\nBledhun asked you to hunt down any Dievlig and recover the sigils stolen from the corpses of his companions.
Talk to Bledhun at his encampment in the Bonevales
Bledhun is at his camp, north of the hill where his party once encamped.\n\nYou should bring the sigils that you recovered to Bledhun.
